content: रुज् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (रुजति, रुग्ण) {@--1@} To break to pieces, destroy; <ls>R. 9. 63</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 73</ls>; <ls>Bk. 4. 43.</ls> {@--2@} To pain, injure, disorder, afflict with disease, (sometimes with gen); रावणस्येह रोक्ष्यंति कपयो भीमविक्रमाः <ls>Bk. 8. 120.</ls> {@--3@} To bend. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (रोजयति-ते) To hurt, kill.

रुज्, रुजा {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [रुज्-क्विप् वाटाप्] {@--1@} Breaking, fracture. {@--2@} Pain, torment, pang, anguish; अनिशमपि मकरकेतुर्मनसो रुजमावहन्नभिमतो मे <ls>Ś. 3. 4</ls>; क्व रुजा हृदयप्रमाथिनी <ls>M. 3. 2</ls>; चरणं रुजापरीतं <ls n="M.">4. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Sickness, malady, disease; <ls>R. 19. 52.</ls> {@--4@} Fatigue, toil, effort, trouble. {@--5@} A ewe. {@--6@} Leprosy.
